long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Explore Chrome with Astronaut Cloud Embers live wallpapers, plus a search bar and quick-access icons for cosmic browsing.

Set your Chrome browsing experience on a celestial journey with the Astronaut Cloud Embers Live Wallpaper extension! Each new tab transforms into a stunning scene of an astronaut floating amid glowing ember clouds, capturing the beauty and mystery of space exploration. Perfect for fans of sci-fi, space, and breathtaking visuals, these live wallpapers bring a sense of wonder and tranquility to your screen.

In addition to the mesmerizing visuals, the extension includes a built-in Google search bar for seamless browsing and customizable quick-access icons for your favorite sites. This feature combines functionality and cosmic beauty, keeping you connected to the internet while immersed in the astronaut’s peaceful yet awe-inspiring surroundings.

For space lovers and dreamers alike, the Astronaut Cloud Embers Live Wallpaper extension adds a touch of the universe’s beauty to your everyday tasks. Let your Chrome browser be a window to the stars, with every new tab radiating the mystery of the cosmos!
